DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety immunogenicity single dose two commercially available vaccine use prevent Haemophilus influenzae type b infection child 13-59 month age .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Monovalent Glycoprotein-Conjugated ( Diptheria Toxin -CRM197 ) Hib Vaccine 13-59 Months Old Healthy Children
DOC.criteria: Infants 1359 month age . Prior Hib vaccine administration . History serious reaction ( ) follow vaccination . Any vaccination within 7 day study vaccination . Known suspected immune impairment . Premature ( 37th week gestation ) birth weight less 2500g For additional entry criterion please refer protocol .
